title: If Draven can catch an opposing Draven's Axes
body:
[](http://puu.sh/nWkQ2/10978b975d.png)
Then let GP detonate an opposing GP's barrels
I want to play this matchup

replies.body: Well, how would the damage play out then? Would you deal the damage cause you blew it up? or would he do the damage because it his barrels?

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lAPKqEdt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-28T00:36:31.526+0000)
>
> Would you deal the damage cause you blew it up? 

Yes
solution: everyone in the barrels dies.

what if he got a leveled barrel first and you didnt, witch damage aplies?
Does his barrel chain explode with yours?
Does it chain explode with his barrels?

> [{quoted}](name=Myozthirirn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lAPKqEdt,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-03-28T01:32:23.411+0000)
>
> what if he got a leveled barrel first and you didnt, witch damage aplies?

Whoever detonated it has their barrel level applied

> Does his barrel chain explode with yours?

Yes

> Does it chain explode with his barrels?

Yes

What happens if you have a chain of 3 barrels in a line:

XYZ

X is near you, Z near the enemy. At the same time, you blow up the nearest barrel. Then who does Barrel Y count for? Would Barrels X and Z deal damage respectively?
yes.
This.  This guy gets it.  You will go far in life.

Well, it creates a Ziggs ult sized explosion destroying everything inside the blast radius.

Or it says derp and does nothing.  My explosive barrel notes got mixed up, so I'm not certain which is which.
But the real question is...what kind of mad man doesn't level barrels first?
A person who wants gold?

lol

Syndra should be able to throw enemy syndra balls.

Zed should be able to teleport to other Zed's shadows. Unless they have different skin. Otherwise they don't know. ,,Wshoom... Oh wait, that ain't my shadow... Well that means..."

Zilean should be able to denote enemy Zilean's bomb with his own. They'd be stacking it like cards. AZ bomb, EZ bomb stun and boom. EZ bomb, AZ bomb stun and boom. Some fair play over there.

Illaoi should be able to manipulate enemy Illaoi's tentacles. Unless they underwent religion schysm. One Illaoi may be Protestant Nagakeborosian while the other is Extreme Orthodox Nagakeboros Practitionist.

Zyra should be able to transform enemy Zyra plantballs. They'd be persuading each other's friends who is more pretty and would argue over it. Who is going to have more friends on Plantbook?

It'll be like a goddamn quickdraw match to see who can detonate the global barrel chain first.

It's not fun unless you ult yourself

So what happens when a Draven who hasn't leveled Q catches an opposing dravens axe? 

Does he get to have a spinning axe then? Does it do bonus damage? If so, how much?
I... am actually genuinely curious how the spaghetti will spin in this one.

I agree.

Although I'm more curious about the noodle wheel myself.

Draven can, but usually shouldn't, catch another Draven's axes because his axes are extremely easy to replace and it would not end in someone (or someone's entire team) getting hit for 1/3+ their health. Draven also would have to go near melee range or BEHIND the other Draven to catch their axe while GP would probably just have to shoot at his own feet to detonate a barrel.
Haha, that would be such chaos it'd be amazing.
what if there's a three barrel chain, and each GP detonates one end of the chain at the same time???
